tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ImagesAndVideos (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    uploaded_by UUID,
    file_name VARCHAR,
    file_type VARCHAR,
    file_size INT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    filename VARCHAR(255),
    image_data BYTEA,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE videos (
    video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    filename VARCHAR(255),
    video_data BYTEA,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP,
    duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE videos (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    video_url VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    title VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE images (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    image_url TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    upload_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE videos (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    video_url TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    upload_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID,
    tags TEXT[],
    size INT,
    resolution TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE video_metadata (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    video_id UUID,
    tags TEXT[],
    duration INTERVAL,
    resolution TEXT
)
